2026-02-03CHMuseums ActReappointment of a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and TechnologyApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of A. Christian Idicula of Edmonton, Alberta, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.N/A
subject: Reappointment of a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology
precis: Approval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of A. Christian Idicula of Edmonton, Alberta, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
